text: Zion Lateef Williamson (born July 6, 2000) is an American professional basketball player for the New Orleans Pelicans of the National Basketball Association (NBA). He plays in the power forward position. He used to play for the Duke University. He gained attention for his slam dunks. He was drafted by the Pelicans in the 1st pick of the 2019 NBA Draft. On July 23, 2019, Williamson signed a five-year, $75 million shoe deal with Air Jordan. title: Zion Williamson
